FTP submodule¶

ftp.calculate_phase_diff_map_1D(dY, dY0, th, ns, mask_for_unwrapping=None)[source]¶

# % Basic FTP treatment. # % This function takes a deformed and a reference image and calculates the phase difference map between the two. # % # % INPUTS: # % dY = deformed image # % dY0 = reference image # % ns = size of gaussian filter # % # % OUTPUT: # % dphase = phase difference map between images

ftp.height_map_from_phase_map(dphase, L, D, p)[source]¶

Converts a phase difference map to a height map using the phase to height relation.
